iati-activity.title: PPA Philippines Programs Jan-Mar 2014
iati-activity.description: The Asia Foundation PPA with DFID CHASE is helping to address common challenges to peaceful state-society relations in fragile states, subnational conflict and post-conflict areas and transitional states at risk of renewed conflict. This activity represents programs in the Southern Philippines under the PPA during the period Jan-Mar 2014. These activities have the following objective: Formal peace processes and informal local peacebuilding efforts strengthened and more credible with conflict-affected populations.
